title: talli nAmIda
sahitya:
talli nAmIda dayarAdA kanna


anupallavi

  pallava pANi nanu bAgugAnu brOva


caraNam 1    patita pAvni nA pApamu tolaginci ati prEmatO nannAdarinci brOva
    caraNam 2    anayamu nE nI manamalaraga kIrtanamulu bADaga vini nanu brOva
    caraNam 3    cAla nammina gOpAladAsunipai Ela parAmukhamEla nEtripurAmpa
